attributes.action: scrap tobacco and cigarette import recomendations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I thought we had free trade in the european market, if so why does the governments, customs and excise officers sieze our goods at airports and our goods and vehicals at ferry terminals with no evidence other than they "think" we are selling them, when they are for personal use, and when the law in this country is innosent until proven guilty.the customs must have evidence before they take our goods
